trans-unit.source: Trample Bloodrush — {5}{G}{G}, Discard Skarrg Goliath: Target attacking creature gets +9/+9 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Trample Bloodrush — {5}{G}{G}, Discard Skarrg Goliath: Target attacking creature gets +9/+9 and gains trample until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: "They bind us with their laws. We free ourselves with nature's fist."\n—Nikya of the Old Ways
trans-unit.target: "They bind us with their laws. We free ourselves with nature's fist."\n—Nikya of the Old Ways

trans-unit.source: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards. Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards. Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.) Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on Fathom Mage, you may draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Flying Battalion — Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: Flying Battalion — Whenever Firemane Avenger and at least two other creatures attack, Firemane Avenger deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.

trans-unit.source: When Foundry Champion enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of creatures you control. {R}: Foundry Champion gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {W}: Foundry Champion gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: When Foundry Champion enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of creatures you control. {R}: Foundry Champion gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {W}: Foundry Champion gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.
trans-unit.target: Rubblehulk's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control. Bloodrush — {1}{R}{G}, Discard Rubblehulk: Target attacking creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of lands you control.

trans-unit.source: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.) Whenever Treasury Thrull attacks, you may return target artifact, creature, or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

trans-unit.source: {G}{U}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {G}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {G}{U}: This turn, each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. {G}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever Nightveil Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library. You may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled with Nightveil Specter.
trans-unit.target: Flying Whenever Nightveil Specter deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library. You may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled with Nightveil Specter.
